channel.title: Parnian Lali - nextcloud
channel.description: Hey, I'm Parnian - AI developer, researcher and I have a great passion for learning new things.

item.title: Installing Collabora Online on Nextcloud with NixOS
item.author: Diogo Correia
item.description: In this post we will take a look at how to setup Collabora Online on a Nextcloud instance using NixOS, resulting in a compelling self-hosted alternative to Google Docs/Sheets/Slides/Drawings.
